description: Plan of plans for README/docs cleanup, bug fixes, tech debt, and feature research
session_startup: Run git status to check branch
Read context/current-task.json to find active sub-plan
If no active sub-plan, find first plan where status=pending

plans.name: README and CLAUDE.md Cleanup
plans.description: Remove invalid crates.io references, add docs badge/section, expand merge examples, update CLAUDE.md

plans.name: Cache Directory Bug Fix
plans.description: Create shared defaults module, fix apply.rs, centralize cache_root logic across all commands

plans.name: Comprehensive Defaults Audit
plans.description: Extend defaults module with config filename, update all hardcoded strings to use constants

plans.name: User Documentation Fixes
plans.description: Fix CLI docs discrepancies, flesh out operator examples to match README

plans.name: Remove AI-isms from Documentation
plans.description: Scan and rewrite docs to remove AI-generated patterns, make them read like developer-written docs

plans.name: Competitive Analysis for Feature Prioritization
plans.description: Research copier, cookiecutter, yeoman, and other tools for feature ideas. Interactive with user.

execution_order.name: Parallel Track A: Docs + Bug Fix
execution_order.notes: These can run in parallel - no dependencies between them

execution_order.name: Sequential: User Docs
execution_order.notes: Depends on README examples from readme-cleanup

execution_order.name: Sequential: AI-isms
execution_order.notes: Do after user-docs-fixes to avoid double-editing

execution_order.name: Parallel Track B: Research
execution_order.notes: Can run anytime - independent of other work

notes: Update current-task.json to point to active sub-plan
Mark sub-plan complete in this file when all its tasks are done
Competitive research can interleave with other work
